trans-unit.source: Provides methods for creating graphics buffers that can be used for double buffering.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para criação de buffers gráficos que podem ser usados para buffer duplo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> classe permite que você implemente o buffer duplo personalizado para seus elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Elementos gráficos que usam o buffer duplo podem reduzir ou eliminar a cintilação causado redesenhando uma superfície de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> control style flag on a control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A maneira mais simples de usar buffer duplo é definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> controlar o sinalizador de estilo em um controle usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> control styles flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> sinalizador de estilos de controle para um controle redireciona toda a pintura para o controle por meio de um buffer de gráfico padrão, sem a necessidade de qualquer código adicional.

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: Este sinalizador é definido como `true` por padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> class provides methods for creating and configuring a graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> classe fornece métodos para criar e configurar um buffer de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method creates a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, which is a wrapper for a graphics buffer that also provides methods you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método cria um <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, que é um wrapper para um buffer de gráficos que também fornece métodos que você pode usar para gravar no buffer e processar seu conteúdo para um dispositivo de saída.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode recuperar o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para o domínio de aplicativo atual de estático <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For graphically intensive applications such as animation, you can create a dedicated <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> using the constructor, but for most applications the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property will be sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicativos com muitos elementos gráficos, como animação, você pode criar um dedicado <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> usando o construtor, mas para a maioria dos aplicativos de <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade será suficiente.

trans-unit.source: For more information on drawing buffered graphics and custom buffering implementations, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md) and [How to: Manually Manage Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o desenho de elementos gráficos em buffer e implementações personalizadas de buffer, consulte [gráficos em buffer duplo](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md) e [como: manualmente gerenciar gráficos em buffer](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to acquire the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como adquirir o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para o domínio de aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" />.

trans-unit.source: For graphically intensive applications such as animation, you can sometimes improve performance by using a dedicated <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> instead of the default instance provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager>.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicativos com muitos elementos gráficos, como animação, você às vezes pode melhorar o desempenho usando um dedicado <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> em vez da instância padrão fornecida pelo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager>.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create and manage graphics buffers individually.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você crie e gerencie os buffers de gráficos individualmente.

trans-unit.source: You should always call <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> when you finish using a dedicated <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Você sempre deve chamar <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> quando você terminar de usar um dedicado <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about dedicated graphics buffers, see [How to: Manually Manage Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre buffers de gráficos dedicado, consulte [como: manualmente gerenciar gráficos em buffer](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Cria um buffer de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to match the pixel format for the new buffer to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para o qual corresponder o formato de pixel para o novo buffer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> indicating the size of the buffer to create.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que indica o tamanho do buffer para criar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics buffer of the specified size using the pixel format of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um buffer de gráficos do tamanho especificado usando o formato de pixel do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics" /> that can be used to draw to a buffer of the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics" /> que pode ser usado para desenhar em um buffer das dimensões especificadas.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method with a rectangle whose size exceeds the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> property, a temporary <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is created to allocate the buffer and provide a temporary context for the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método com um retângulo cujo tamanho excede o valor da <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> propriedade, um temporário <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> é criado para alocar o buffer e fornecer um contexto temporário para o buffer.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is distinct from the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the application domain and it is disposed automatically when the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> returned by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method is disposed.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> é diferente de <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para o aplicativo de domínio e ele é descartado automaticamente quando o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> retornado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método é descartado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating a graphics buffer using the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um buffer de gráficos usando o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> to a device context to match the pixel format of the new buffer to.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> para um contexto de dispositivo ao qual corresponder o formato de pixel do novo buffer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> indicating the size of the buffer to create.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que indica o tamanho do buffer para criar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics buffer of the specified size using the pixel format of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um buffer de gráficos do tamanho especificado usando o formato de pixel do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics" /> that can be used to draw to a buffer of the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics" /> que pode ser usado para desenhar em um buffer das dimensões especificadas.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method with a rectangle whose size exceeds the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> property, a temporary <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is created to allocate the buffer and provide a temporary context for the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método com um retângulo cujo tamanho excede o valor da <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> propriedade, um temporário <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> é criado para alocar o buffer e fornecer um contexto temporário para o buffer.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is distinct from the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the application domain and it is disposed automatically when the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> returned by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method is disposed.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> é diferente de <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para o aplicativo de domínio e ele é descartado automaticamente quando o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> retornado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método é descartado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating a graphics buffer using the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um buffer de gráficos usando o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para acessar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração relacionada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> método o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes de ser recuperado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the current graphics buffer, if a buffer has been allocated and has not yet been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Descarta o buffer de gráficos atual, se um buffer tiver sido alocado e ainda não tiver sido descartado.

trans-unit.source: If the graphics buffer is in use, it will be marked for disposal as soon as it is free; otherwise, it will be disposed immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se o buffer de gráficos está em uso, ele será marcado para descarte assim que é gratuito; Caso contrário, ele será descartado imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho máximo do buffer a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> indicating the maximum size of the buffer dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que indica o tamanho máximo das dimensões de buffer.

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to get or set the maximum dimensions for a buffer that should be retained in memory.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade permite que você obtenha ou defina as dimensões máximas por um buffer que deve ser mantido na memória.

trans-unit.source: You can allocate a buffer of any size, however any buffer with dimensions greater than the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> size will be used temporarily and then discarded when the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object is released.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alocar um buffer de qualquer tamanho, no entanto, qualquer buffer com dimensões maior do que o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> tamanho será usada temporariamente e, em seguida, é descartada quando o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> objeto é liberado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the maximum size for the buffer for a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra definindo o tamanho máximo para o buffer para um <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: The height or width of the size is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: A altura ou a largura do tamanho é menor ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: for allowing user access to all windows.
trans-unit.target: para permitir o acesso de usuário para todas as janelas.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração relacionada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
